name: Aida Syrkett
body:
##AIDA JOSEPHINE SYRKETT
aida.syrkett@gmail.com

###EDUCATION
**Information Technology (ITEC), Bachelor of Science - Software Development Concentration**
*Georgia Gwinnett College (GGC) - Lawrenceville, GA*
Overall GPA: 4.00		ITEC GPA: 4.00
Expected Graduation Date: May 2015

####RELEVANT COURSES:
* Software Development I & II
* Advanced Programming (Java)
* Introduction to Databases
* Software Development Project (In progress)
* Software Testing & QA (In progress)
* Human Computer Interaction (In progress) 

*Brookwood High School - Snellville, GA*
Overall GPA: 4.00		Class Rank: 11 out of 723 students
Graduation Date: May 2011

###WORK EXPERIENCE
**SAGE NORTH AMERICA (Small Business Solutions, Sage 50 – US Edition), Software Engineer Intern – Lawrenceville, GA**
*May 2014 - Aug. 2014*
* Research and correct defects in product code, consisting of C# and C/C++ languages, in Sage 50 software
* Created an XML utility executable in C# to unblock QA’s automation testing and continue SilkTests
* Worked with agile team in daily stand-up meetings and completed assigned stories with VersionOne agile tool

**GEORGIA GWINNETT COLLEGE, Women in Information Technology Summer Boot Camp Advisor – Lawrenceville, GA**
*May 12 – May 16, 2014*
* Teach and assist fellow female students with little to no programming experience through a crash course of Java
* Presented information on Practice-It!, an online application for Java programming practice, and explained techniques and WIT support networks to succeed in future information technology classes

**GEORGIA GWINNETT COLLEGE (Library Information Systems), Student Assistant – Lawrenceville, GA**
*Aug. 2012 - Present*
* Monitor campus helpdesks and assist students and faculty with campus computers, printing system, and software

**GEORGIA GWINNETT COLLEGE (Academic Enhancement Center), Information Technology Peer Tutor – Lawrenceville, GA**
*Jan. 2014 - May 2014*
* Tutor students in Introduction, Intermediate, and Advanced Programming (Java) courses and other IT courses, such as Introduction to Computing and Digital Media

###SKILLS
####Languages
Java, C#, JavaScript, HTML/CSS, PHP, MySQL
####Training/experience
Agile project management, VersionOne training, Git

###HONORS / AWARDS
2014	Practice-It! #1 Top User asyrkett with 1843 problems solved; http://practiceit.cs.washington.edu/
2013	Co-wrote grant application for National Center for Women & Information Technology (NCWIT) Student Seed Fund; Women in Information Technology (WIT) at GGC awarded $1000
2012-14		President’s List, Georgia Gwinnett College (Fall 2012, Spring 2013, Fall 2013, Spring 2014)
2011	National Runner-Up & Georgia Affiliate Winner of the NCWIT Awards for Aspirations in Computing
2011		Accepted to Massachusetts Institute of Technology (MIT) as Undergraduate
2011		National Achievement Award & National Merit Commended Student

###EXTRACURRICULAR / VOLUNTEER EXPERIENCE / COMMUNITY SERVICE
Summer 2013	Women in Information Technology (WIT) at GGC, Advisory Board Member
2010 - 2011	Future Business Leaders of America, Secretary of Computer Science Club
2012 - 2013	Co-Coach of Brookwood High School Gwinnett Readers Rally Team
